entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
